author: Cara Lombardo
title: Does America Really Need Another Light Beer? Corona Thinks So
text:
As Americans pay more for natural dog food, organic macaroni and cheese and small-batch tequila, beer companies say light-beer drinkers want an upgrade, too.
Constellation Brands Inc., the U.S. distributor of Corona, and Anheuser-Busch InBev SA are rolling out higher-priced lower-calorie brews they say are aimed at satisfying drinkersâ€™ thirst for a more sophisticated light beer. 

U.S....
